Screenshot Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2018-02-06  | Version: 0.0.8-SNAPSHOT
Screenshot Maven Plugin
Parent Project
  • Screenshot Maven Plugin Parent
Project Documentation
  • Project Reports

screenshot:gallery

Full name:

se.bluebrim.maven.plugin:screenshot-maven-plugin:0.0.8-SNAPSHOT:gallery

Description:

Generates a screenshots gallery report.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
outputDirectory String - Directory where the generated AsciiDoc will go.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}.
sourceCodeURL String - URL to the source code used to build the source code links under each screenshot image in the report

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
locales List - A screenshot will be created for each Locale where the file name is appended with the Locale as string.
maxWidth int - Maximum screenshot width
Default value is: 600.

Parameter Details

locales:

A screenshot will be created for each Locale where the file name is appended with the Locale as string.
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

maxWidth:

Maximum screenshot width
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • Default: 600

outputDirectory:

Directory where the generated AsciiDoc will go.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}

sourceCodeURL:

URL to the source code used to build the source code links under each screenshot image in the report
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
